metadata.purpose: Interactive guided visual validation of model predictions

sampling.note: Probability values are INVERTED (high = healthy, low = stressed)

validation_approach.description: Model predictions visible with interactive HTML interface
validation_approach.goal: Check visual consistency, not absolute accuracy
validation_approach.interface: HTML with dropdown menus and CSV export

expected_outcomes.interpretation: Agreement shows visual consistency, not ground truth accuracy

output_file: validation_results.csv (generated by user via HTML interface)
